# Generating panel data for screening population
```{r}
library(XSRecency)
library(geepack)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
YEAR2DAY=365.25

get.phi.function = function(window.period, shadow.period, phi_tfrr = NULL, 
                            phi_frr = NULL, phi_norm_mu = NULL, phi_norm_sd = NULL, 
                            phi_norm_div = NULL, phi_pnorm_mu = NULL, phi_pnorm_sd = NULL, 
                            phi_pnorm_div = NULL){
  # Get the gamma parameters and baseline phi function
  params = get.gamma.params(window=window.period/YEAR2DAY, shadow=shadow.period/YEAR2DAY)
  # Set up each type of phi function, will be overwritten
  phi.none = function(t) 1-pgamma(t, shape = params[1], rate = params[2])
  phi.const = function(t) 1-pgamma(t, shape = params[1], rate = params[2])
  phi.norm = function(t) 1-pgamma(t, shape = params[1], rate = params[2])
  phit.pnorm = function(t) 1-pgamma(t, shape = params[1], rate = params[2])
  
  phi.func = phi.none
  
  # Get the phi function with constant FRR either past a certain time
  # or fixed after it hits some value.
  if(!is.null(phi_tfrr) | !is.null(phi_frr)){
    if(!is.null(phi_tfrr)){
      ttime = phi_tfrr
      tval = phi.none(ttime)
    }
    if(!is.null(phi_frr)){
      tau = 12
      tval = phi_frr
      ttime = uniroot(function(t) phi.none(t) - tval, interval=c(0, tau))$root
      cat(ttime)
    }
    phi.const = function(t, ...) phi.none(t)*(t <= ttime) + tval*(t > ttime)
    phi.func = phi.const
  }
  if(!is.null(phi_norm_mu)){
    phi.norm = function(t) phi.const(t) + dnorm(t-phi_norm_mu, mean=0, sd=phi_norm_sd) / phi_norm_div
    phi.func = phi.norm
  }
  if(!is.null(phi_pnorm_mu)){
    phi.pnorm = function(t) phi.const(t) + pnorm(t-phi_pnorm_mu, mean=0, sd=phi_pnorm_sd) / phi_pnorm_div
    phi.func = phi.pnorm
  }
  return(phi.func)
}


get_panel_crossSec = function(n_sims, sample_size_crossSec, profiles_crossSec, 
                          infection.function, bigT_crossSec){
  # Within a column: number of observations of each group of individuals generated by
  # multinomial distribution
  # Different columns are different replications
  num_obs_crossSec = rmultinom(n_sims, size = sample_size_crossSec, prob = profiles_crossSec$Proportion)
  out_panel_datalist = vector("list", length = nrow(profiles_crossSec))
  for(i in 1:nrow(profiles_crossSec)){
    cat("\nGenerating ", i, "th group for cross-sectional recency testing data:\n")
    group_incid_crossSec = profiles_crossSec$Incidence[i]
    group_preval_crossSec = profiles_crossSec$Prevalence[i]
    phi.function = get.phi.function(profiles_crossSec$Window[i], profiles_crossSec$Shadow[i], phi_frr = profiles_crossSec$FRR[i])
    
    group_panel_datalist = vector("list", length = n_sims)
    for(j in 1:n_sims){
      if(j %% 200 == 0){
        cat("Generating", j, "th replication\n")
      }
      group_num_obs_crossSec = num_obs_crossSec[i, j]
      if(group_num_obs_crossSec == 0){
        group_panel_datalist[[j]] = NULL
      }
      else{
        group_panel_data = generate.data(1, group_num_obs_crossSec, infection.function = infection.function, baseline_incidence = group_incid_crossSec, prevalence = group_preval_crossSec, rho = NA, phi.func = phi.function, times = 0, summarize = FALSE)[, c("pos", "rpos")]
        group_panel_data$sim = j
        
        group_panel_datalist[[j]] = group_panel_data
      }
    }
    group_panel_nsims = data.table::rbindlist(group_panel_datalist)
    group_panel_nsims$rInfection_pos = profiles_crossSec$rInfection_pos[i]
    group_panel_nsims$Receptive = profiles_crossSec$Receptive[i]
    group_panel_nsims$Anal_nocondom = profiles_crossSec$Anal_nocondom[i]
    group_panel_nsims$College = profiles_crossSec$College[i]
    group_panel_nsims$Subtype = profiles_crossSec$Subtype[i]
    out_panel_datalist[[i]] = group_panel_nsims
  }
  out_panel_data = data.table::rbindlist(out_panel_datalist)
  
  return(out_panel_data)
}


get_panel_trial = function(n_sims, sample_size_trial, profiles_trial, follow_time){
  
  # Within a column: number of observations of each group of individuals generated by
  # multinomial distribution
  # Different columns are different replications
  num_obs_trial = rmultinom(n_sims, size = sample_size_trial, prob = profiles_trial$Proportion)
  out_panel_datalist = vector("list", length = nrow(profiles_trial))
  for(i in 1:nrow(profiles_trial)){
    cat("\nGenerating ", i, "th group for the (trial) data from the target population:\n")
    group_incid_trial = profiles_trial$Incidence[i]
    
    group_panel_datalist = vector("list", length = n_sims)
    for(j in 1:n_sims){
      if(j %% 200 == 0){
        cat("Generating", j, "th replication\n")
      }
      group_num_obs_trial = num_obs_trial[i, j]
      if(group_num_obs_trial == 0){
        group_panel_datalist[[j]] = NULL
      }
      else{
        rand_num = runif(n = group_num_obs_trial)
        itime_trial = -log(rand_num) / group_incid_trial
        event=as.integer(itime_trial <= follow_time)
        itime_trial[which(event == 0)] = follow_time
        
        group_panel_data = data.frame(itime_trial=itime_trial, event=event)
        group_panel_data$sim = j
        
        group_panel_datalist[[j]] = group_panel_data
      }
    }
    group_panel_nsims = data.table::rbindlist(group_panel_datalist)
    group_panel_nsims$rInfection_pos = profiles_crossSec$rInfection_pos[i]
    group_panel_nsims$Receptive = profiles_crossSec$Receptive[i]
    group_panel_nsims$Anal_nocondom = profiles_crossSec$Anal_nocondom[i]
    group_panel_nsims$College = profiles_crossSec$College[i]
    group_panel_nsims$Subtype = profiles_crossSec$Subtype[i]
    out_panel_datalist[[i]] = group_panel_nsims
  }
  out_panel_data = data.table::rbindlist(out_panel_datalist)
  
  return(out_panel_data)
}
```


# Estimate the incidence ratio
```{r}
est_background_incidence = function(n_sims, sample_size_crossSec, sample_size_trial,
                               crossSec_data, trial_data, 
                               beta1_ests, omega1_ests,
                               beta1_vars, omega1_vars,
                               beta2_ests, omega2_ests,
                               beta2_vars, omega2_vars,
                               pop1 = "Screening Neg & Rec", pop2 = "Trial", 
                               bootstrap = TRUE, n_bootstrap=100,
                               form = population ~ rInfection_pos + Receptive + Anal_nocondom + College){
  incidence_lambda0_ests = sapply(1:n_sims, function(i){
    if(i %% 5 == 0){
      cat(i)
    }
    trial_1sim = trial_data[which(trial_data$sim == i), ]
    trial_1sim[, sim := NULL]
    trial_1sim$population = 1
    trial_1sim_type1 = trial_1sim %>% filter(Subtype == 0)
    trial_1sim_type2 = trial_1sim %>% filter(Subtype == 1)
    
    crossSec_1sim = crossSec_data[which(crossSec_data$sim == i), ]
    crossSec_1sim[, sim := NULL]
    crossSec_1sim$population = 0
    crossSec_1sim_type1 = crossSec_1sim %>% filter(Subtype == 0)
    crossSec_1sim_type2 = crossSec_1sim %>% filter(Subtype == 1)
    
    beta1_est = beta1_ests[i]
    omega1_est = omega1_ests[i]
    beta2_est = beta2_ests[i]
    omega2_est = omega2_ests[i]
    if(bootstrap){
      beta1_var = beta1_vars[[i]]
      omega1_var = omega1_vars[[i]]
      beta2_var = beta2_vars[[i]]
      omega2_var = omega2_vars[[i]]
      bs_crossSec_ids = replicate(n_bootstrap, sample(1:sample_size_crossSec, sample_size_crossSec, replace = TRUE))
      bs_trial_ids = replicate(n_bootstrap, sample(1:sample_size_trial, sample_size_trial, replace = TRUE))
      
      if(omega1_var == 0){
        bs_omega1_ests = rep(omega1_est, n_bootstrap)
      }
      else{
        bs_omega1_ests = exp(rnorm(n_bootstrap, log(omega1_est), sqrt(omega1_var)/omega1_est))
      }
      if(omega2_var == 0){
        bs_omega2_ests = rep(omega2_est, n_bootstrap)
      }
      else{
        bs_omega2_ests = exp(rnorm(n_bootstrap, log(omega2_est), sqrt(omega2_var)/omega2_est))
      }
      if(beta1_var == 0){
        bs_beta1_ests = rep(beta1_est, n_bootstrap)
      }
      else{
        bs_beta1_ests = exp(rnorm(n_bootstrap, log(beta1_est), sqrt(beta1_var)/beta1_est))
      }
      if(beta2_var == 0){
        bs_beta2_ests = rep(beta2_est, n_bootstrap)
      }
      else{
        bs_beta2_ests = exp(rnorm(n_bootstrap, log(beta2_est), sqrt(beta2_var)/beta2_est))
      }
    }
    
    if(pop1 != "All" | pop2 != "All"){
      if(pop1 == "Screening Neg" & pop2 == "Trial"){
        concact_1sim_type1_lr = rbindlist(list(crossSec_1sim_type1 %>%
                                                 filter(pos == 0) %>%
          select(rInfection_pos, Receptive, Anal_nocondom, College, population),
          trial_1sim_type1 %>%
          select(rInfection_pos, Receptive, Anal_nocondom, College, population)))
        
        concact_1sim_type2_lr = rbindlist(list(crossSec_1sim_type2 %>%
                                                 filter(pos == 0) %>%
          select(rInfection_pos, Receptive, Anal_nocondom, College, population),
          trial_1sim_type2 %>%
          select(rInfection_pos, Receptive, Anal_nocondom, College, population)))
       
        
        lrm_type1 = glm(formula = form, data = concact_1sim_type1_lr, family = binomial())
        crossSec_1sim_type1$weight = predict.glm(lrm_type1, crossSec_1sim_type1, type = "response")
        if(max(crossSec_1sim_type1$weight) == 1){
          cat(i," th replication has infinite weight for subtype 1\n")
          crossSec_1sim_type1$weight[which(crossSec_1sim_type1$weight == 1)] = 0.95
        }
        crossSec_1sim_type1$weight = crossSec_1sim_type1$weight / (1-crossSec_1sim_type1$weight)
        
        lrm_type2 = glm(formula = form, data = concact_1sim_type2_lr, family = binomial())
        crossSec_1sim_type2$weight = predict.glm(lrm_type2, crossSec_1sim_type2, type = "response")
        if(max(crossSec_1sim_type2$weight) == 1){
          cat(i," th replication has infinite weight for subtype 2\n")
          crossSec_1sim_type2$weight[which(crossSec_1sim_type2$weight == 1)] = 0.95
        }
        crossSec_1sim_type2$weight = crossSec_1sim_type2$weight / (1-crossSec_1sim_type2$weight)
      
        lambda0_type1 = sum(crossSec_1sim_type1$weight * crossSec_1sim_type1$pos * 
                      (crossSec_1sim_type1$rpos - beta1_est), na.rm = TRUE) /
                sum(crossSec_1sim_type1$weight * (1 - crossSec_1sim_type1$pos) * 
                        (omega1_est - beta1_est * bigT_crossSec))
        
        lambda0_type2 = sum(crossSec_1sim_type2$weight * crossSec_1sim_type2$pos * 
                      (crossSec_1sim_type2$rpos - beta2_est), na.rm = TRUE) /
                sum(crossSec_1sim_type2$weight * (1 - crossSec_1sim_type2$pos) * 
                        (omega2_est - beta2_est * bigT_crossSec))
        lambda0 = (lambda0_type1 * nrow(trial_1sim_type1) + lambda0_type2 * nrow(trial_1sim_type2)) / sample_size_trial
        crossSec_1sim_type1[, weight := NULL]
        crossSec_1sim_type2[, weight := NULL]
        
        if(bootstrap){
          bs_lambda0_ests = sapply(1:n_bootstrap, function(x){
            bs_omega1_est = bs_omega1_ests[x]
            bs_beta1_est = bs_beta1_ests[x]
            bs_omega2_est = bs_omega2_ests[x]
            bs_beta2_est = bs_beta2_ests[x]
            
            # Get the bootstrap sample
            crossSec_bs = crossSec_1sim[bs_crossSec_ids[, x], ]
            trial_bs = trial_1sim[bs_trial_ids[, x], ]
            
            crossSec_bs_type1 = crossSec_bs %>% filter(Subtype == 0)
            crossSec_bs_type2 = crossSec_bs %>% filter(Subtype == 1)
            
            trial_bs_type1 = trial_bs %>% filter(Subtype == 0)
            trial_bs_type2 = trial_bs %>% filter(Subtype == 1)
            
            concact_bs_type1_lr = rbindlist(list(crossSec_bs_type1 %>%
                                                 filter(pos == 0) %>%
              select(rInfection_pos, Receptive, Anal_nocondom, College, population),
              trial_bs_type1 %>%
              select(rInfection_pos, Receptive, Anal_nocondom, College, population)))
          
            concact_bs_type2_lr = rbindlist(list(crossSec_bs_type2 %>%
                                                 filter(pos == 0) %>%
              select(rInfection_pos, Receptive, Anal_nocondom, College, population),
              trial_bs_type2 %>%
              select(rInfection_pos, Receptive, Anal_nocondom, College, population)))
            
            bs_lrm_type1 = glm(formula = form, data = concact_bs_type1_lr, family = binomial())
            crossSec_bs_type1$weight = predict.glm(bs_lrm_type1, crossSec_bs_type1, type = "response")
            crossSec_bs_type1$weight[which(crossSec_bs_type1$weight == 1)] = 0.95
            crossSec_bs_type1$weight = crossSec_bs_type1$weight / (1-crossSec_bs_type1$weight)
            
            bs_lrm_type2 = glm(formula = form, data = concact_bs_type2_lr, family = binomial())
            crossSec_bs_type2$weight = predict.glm(bs_lrm_type2, crossSec_bs_type2, type = "response")
            crossSec_bs_type2$weight[which(crossSec_bs_type2$weight == 1)] = 0.95
            crossSec_bs_type2$weight = crossSec_bs_type2$weight / (1-crossSec_bs_type2$weight)
          
            bs_lambda0_type1 = sum(crossSec_bs_type1$weight * crossSec_bs_type1$pos * 
                          (crossSec_bs_type1$rpos - bs_beta1_est), na.rm = TRUE) /
                    sum(crossSec_bs_type1$weight * (1 - crossSec_bs_type1$pos) * 
                            (bs_omega1_est - bs_beta1_est * bigT_crossSec))
            bs_lambda0_type2 = sum(crossSec_bs_type2$weight * crossSec_bs_type2$pos * 
                          (crossSec_bs_type2$rpos - bs_beta2_est), na.rm = TRUE) /
                    sum(crossSec_bs_type2$weight * (1 - crossSec_bs_type2$pos) * 
                            (bs_omega2_est - bs_beta2_est * bigT_crossSec))
            
            bs_lambda0 = (bs_lambda0_type1 * nrow(trial_bs_type1) + bs_lambda0_type2 * nrow(trial_bs_type2)) / sample_size_trial
            return(bs_lambda0)
          })
          return(c(lambda0, sd(bs_lambda0_ests), quantile(bs_lambda0_ests, c(0.025,0.975)), sd(log(bs_lambda0_ests))))
        }
      
        return(lambda0)
      }
      
      
      else if(pop1 == "None" & pop2 == "None"){
        lambda0_type1 = sum(crossSec_1sim_type1$pos * 
                      (crossSec_1sim_type1$rpos - beta1_est), na.rm = TRUE) /

                    sum(crossSec_bs_type1$weight * (1 - crossSec_bs_type1$pos) * 
                            (bs_omega1_est - bs_beta1_est * bigT_crossSec))
            bs_lambda0_type2 = sum(crossSec_bs_type2$weight * crossSec_bs_type2$pos * 
                          (crossSec_bs_type2$rpos - bs_beta2_est), na.rm = TRUE) /
                    sum(crossSec_bs_type2$weight * (1 - crossSec_bs_type2$pos) * 
                            (bs_omega2_est - bs_beta2_est * bigT_crossSec))
            
            bs_lambda0_scrn_neg_trl = (bs_lambda0_type1 * nrow(trial_bs_type1) + bs_lambda0_type2 * nrow(trial_bs_type2)) / sample_size_trial
            
            
            bs_lambda0_type1 = sum(crossSec_bs_type1$pos * 
                          (crossSec_bs_type1$rpos - bs_beta1_est), na.rm = TRUE) /
                    sum((1 - crossSec_bs_type1$pos) * 
                            (bs_omega1_est - bs_beta1_est * bigT_crossSec))
            bs_lambda0_type2 = sum(crossSec_bs_type2$pos * 
                          (crossSec_bs_type2$rpos - bs_beta2_est), na.rm = TRUE) /
                    sum((1 - crossSec_bs_type2$pos) * 
                            (bs_omega2_est - bs_beta2_est * bigT_crossSec))
            
            bs_lambda0_none_none = (bs_lambda0_type1 * nrow(trial_bs_type1) + bs_lambda0_type2 * nrow(trial_bs_type2)) / sample_size_trial
            
            return(c(bs_lambda0_scrn_neg_trl,
                     bs_lambda0_none_none))
          })
          
          bs_lambda0_ests_scrn_neg_trl = bs_lambda0_ests[1, ]
          bs_lambda0_ests_none_none = bs_lambda0_ests[2, ]
          
          return(c(lambda0_scrn_neg_trl, sd(bs_lambda0_ests_scrn_neg_trl), 
                   quantile(bs_lambda0_ests_scrn_neg_trl, c(0.025,0.975)), sd(log(bs_lambda0_ests_scrn_neg_trl)),
                   lambda0_none_none, sd(bs_lambda0_ests_none_none), 
                   quantile(bs_lambda0_ests_none_none, c(0.025,0.975)), sd(log(bs_lambda0_ests_none_none))))
      }
      return(c(lambda0_scrn_neg_trl, lambda0_none_none))
    }
  })
  
  return(incidence_lambda0_ests)
}
```

```{r}
simulate_beta_study = function(n_long_infect, phi.func, minT, maxT){
  N = n_long_infect

  inf_times = runif(n=N, min=minT, max=maxT)
  recent = rbinom(n=N, size=1, p=phi.func(inf_times))
  
  beta_study = data.frame(inf_times=inf_times, recent=recent)
  return(beta_study)
}


simulate_beta_studies = function(nsims, n_long_infect, phi.func, minT, maxT){
  beta_studies = replicate(nsims, simulate_beta_study(n_long_infect, phi.func, minT, maxT),
                           simplify = FALSE)
  
  return(beta_studies)
}
```

```{r}
nsim_background_incidence_ests_bs = function(weight_methods, path){

    bs_up_quantile = res[4,]
    bs_log_ses = res[5,]
    output$lambda0_est_avg = mean(lambda0_ests)
    output$true_lambda0 = true_lambda0
    output$lambda0_est_sd = sd(lambda0_ests)
    output$lambda0_bs_se_avg = mean(bs_ses)
    output$lambda0_bs_se_med = median(bs_ses)
    output$lambda0_bs_se_delta_avg = mean(bs_log_ses * lambda0_ests)
    output$lambda0_bs_se_delta_med = median(bs_log_ses * lambda0_ests)
    output$cover_rate_bs_se = mean(lambda0_ests - qnorm(0.975)*bs_ses <= true_lambda0 & lambda0_ests + qnorm(0.975)*bs_ses >= true_lambda0)
    output$cover_rate_bs_quantile = mean(bs_low_quantile <= true_lambda0 & bs_up_quantile >= true_lambda0)
    output$cover_rate_bs_log_se = mean(log(lambda0_ests) - qnorm(0.975)*bs_log_ses <= log(true_lambda0) & log(lambda0_ests) + qnorm(0.975)*bs_log_ses >= log(true_lambda0) & lambda0_ests > 0 & (!is.na(bs_log_ses)))

    output$lambda0_est_sd = sd(lambda0_ests)

    output$cover_rate_bs_quantile = mean(bs_low_quantile <= true_lambda0 & bs_up_quantile >= true_lambda0)
    output$cover_rate_bs_log_se = mean(log(lambda0_ests) - qnorm(0.975)*bs_log_ses <= log(true_lambda0) & log(lambda0_ests) + qnorm(0.975)*bs_log_ses >= log(true_lambda0) & lambda0_ests > 0 & (!is.na(bs_log_ses)))
    
    full_output$lambda0_ests = lambda0_ests
    full_output$bs_ses = bs_ses
    full_output$bs_low_quantile = bs_low_quantile
    full_output$bs_up_quantile = bs_up_quantile

    write.csv(output, paste0(path, "None_None.csv"), row.names = FALSE)

  }
  else{
    for(w in weight_methods){

      lambda0_ests = res[1,]

      output$cover_rate_bs_quantile = mean(bs_low_quantile <= true_lambda0 & bs_up_quantile >= true_lambda0)
```

```{r}
shadow2 = (profiles_crossSec$Shadow[which(profiles_crossSec$Subtype == 1)])[1]
```
